# TASK::STOP_ANIM_PLAYBACK

## Summary
Stops animation on an existing TASK_SCRIPTED_ANIMATION

## Parameters
* **ENTITY_INDEX** entity
* **ANIM_PRIORITY_FLAGS** priority = 0:
The priority level to stop.
specify either AF_PRIORITY_HIGH, AF_PRIORITY_MEDIUM or AF_PRIORITY_LOW.
Any animation playing at this priority level will blend out with its specified blend out duration.
* **BOOL** secondary = false

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Stops playback of animation on the given priority level of an existing TASK_SCRIPTED_ANIMATION

Looks like p1 may be a flag, still need to do some research, though.
